enrol:

remind_exam:
Dear [FULLNAME],

This email from PHH Academy is to notify you that,

The Annual PHH Academy TOEIC TEST is ready for you to complete,

From [QUIZSTART] to [QUIZEND]

Please log in to the PHH Academy using this link https://academy.phh-group.com to do the test by the required time.

Note: This test must be taken continuously for 120 minutes (without pausing or stopping), so please arrange your time & workload to take the test in such a way that you can focus on achieving the best score possible.

Good Luck!

T&D Team
invitation_offline_course:
Dear [FULLNAME],

You are invited to attend the [COURSENAME] face to face training workshop, with the following information:

Objectives: [COURSELEARNINGOUTCOMES]

Language: [LANGUAGE]

Trainers: [TRAINER]

Venue: [COURSEPLACE]

Time: [STARTTIME] – [ENDTIME], & [DATE]

This training course is open to all local staff/managers in PHH Group Hanoi to register and join. However, only 20 slots are available for this [FIRST] session and places will be allocated on a first come first served basis. So don’t procrastinate – hurry up and secure your seat!

To register, you just need approval from your line manager then click to this link to confirm before [DEADLINE] (examples 17:00, 10th  July 2019]).

If you are interested in the training workshop, but cannot join, please feel free to share with us the reasons in the link! We may consider organizing another session if we have extra demand.

Thank you and best regards,

T&D Team
notice_spam_email:

This is testing email from Elearning
We are so sorry for the inconvience, please help to ignore this email.
Thanks & Best regards,
Developer team
